channel.title: Improve Your Workflows on menziess blog
channel.description: Recent content in Improve Your Workflows on menziess blog

item.title: Enhance Your Python-vscode Workflow
item.description: This post covers my personal workflow for python projects, using Visual Studio Code along with some other tools. A good workflow saves time and allows you to focus on the problem at hand, instead of tasks that make you feel like a robot (machines are good for that).

item.title: Enhance Your Databricks Workflow
item.description: With databricks-connect you can connect your favorite IDE to your Databricks cluster. This means that you can now lint, test, and package the code that you want to run on Databricks more easily:
